inputs.description: Defines the transformation.  The current possibilities are: SPEARMAN   ==> convert the data to ranks, so that the resulting individual subject correlations in 3dGroupInCorr are Spearman correlations QUANTILE:n ==> convert the data to n-levels of quantiles, so that the individual subject correlations become quantile correlations.  If ':n' is not given, then n=9 will be used.  NOTA BENE: ---------- Normally, you would probably do something like cp XXX.grpincorr.niml SP_XXX.grpincorr.niml cp XXX.grpincorr.data SP_XXX.grpincorr.data 3dTransformGroupInCorr -prep SPEARMAN SP_XXX.grpincorr.niml In this way, you would keep the original files for comparison purposes.  Author -- RWCox -- May 2012  ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: PREP
